DOC.brief_summary: This study scope validate accuracy usability Soberlink Cellular Device comparison predicate device , BACtrack S80 Pro .
DOC.brief_title: Accuracy & Usability Study Soberlink Cellular Device
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose accuracy usability study validate performance Soberlink Cellular Device hand intend ( lay ) user - untrained study participant consume alcohol use Soberlink Cellular Device measure blood alcohol content ( BAC ) comparison predicate device . The purpose document define human factor environment impact actual user interface design well usability engineering evaluate user interface via usability objective usability test . This accuracy usability study perform Soberlink Cellular Device order comply FDA 's Draft Guidance Industry Food Drug Administration Staff , title : Applying Human Factors Usability Engineering Optimize Medical Device Design , IEC 60601-1-6 ( collateral standard usability engineering medical electrical equipment ) , IEC 62366 ( application usability engineering medical device ) .
DOC.criteria: Subject willing sign inform consent Male female subject age 2199 year old Untrained subject use Alcohol Breathalyzer Subject willing consume two alcoholic drink Subjects willing use two Alcohol Breathalyzers Subject willing complete Questionnaire Subject previous Alcohol Breathalyzer experience Subject currently substance use rehabilitation post rehabilitation , unauthorized consume alcohol reason Subject lung disease , physically unable provide deep lung exhalation 4 second Subject unwilling drink two alcoholic drink Subject unwilling complete questionnaire Subject nonEnglish speaking Subject child , adolescent , cognitively impaired . Subject pregnant and/or breastfeed woman
